name: Beehive Software
description:
Beehive Software Services provides state-of-the-art, technology-centric solution that help companies to develop, manage, reward and retain their most important asset – their people. With many year’s of experience in delivering HR software solutions in the field of complete Employee life cycle management, Beehive is committed to deliver service excellence.
 Beehive prime focus lies in providing flexible, people-centric solution that improves day-to-day execution of HCM strategies to drive the HR processes which are critical for organization’s success which helps to maintain a competitive talent advantage. By empowering the organization to focus on considerable value of its people towards its goals, Beehive HCM ensures significantly improved corporate performance and results.. Beehive Software Services offers In house, Hosted and Software as a Service (SaaS) HCM software systems that are designed to support both local and international deployment including solutions for Leave and Attendance, Payroll Management, Employee Performance Management, Employee Survey, Training & Development, Recruitment Management and many more.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
